pre_stage_scripts: echo "run this script before this stage is started"
post_stage_scripts: echo "run this script after this stage is complete"
pre_query_cycle_scripts: echo "execute this script before starting all runs of the same query in this stage"
pre_query_scripts: echo "run this script before each query in this stage is started"
post_query_scripts: echo "run this script after each query in this stage is complete"
post_query_cycle_scripts: echo "execute this script after all runs of the same query in this stage have completed"
